channel.title: STA9221 driver missing
channel.description:
It looks like the driver files for the STA9221 are missing in WhoNix, the files are snd_hda_intel. I need these files to get the sound working in a whonix installation for a friend. Is there anything I can do to get the files I need?
Dennis

item.title: STA9221 driver missing
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Can probably only be sorted out as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

Read full topic
